str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

str2: To pray, pray for, offer prayer. From pros and euchomai; to pray to God, i.e. Supplicate, worship.
The tongue; by implication, a language.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

str2: To pray, pray for, offer prayer. From pros and euchomai; to pray to God, i.e. Supplicate, worship.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Probably from the base of ginosko; the intellect, i.e. Mind; by implication, meaning.

str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
